name: Hell Back：Huner
description:
In order to free your girlfriend from the trial of heaven, you set foot on the road of hunting demons. It's up to you to absorb the power of the devil or rely on the gun in your hand to make your own choice!

WASD moves. Fire to the left. Aim right. M map. f fire hellLaser。  clean room to  upgrad and also the chest. Beat Rockman to get epicupgrade.

Thank you for your playing. I make 3D games for the first time in 72 hours. It took me a lot of time to build the framework, and the richness and balance of props needed time to improve.

It is very little chance  that you will not be able to enter the room. I'm sorry that randomMap needs debugging, ahhhhh.

By the way, the last picture is my best score in my game, you must  be better. Tip: bullets are better at low level, but lasers grow faster.
